long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***Bridge currently only supports MetaMask sandbox transactions.***

Quickly off-ramp crypto in private. Bridge converts crypto virtual prepaid cards for online or in-person transactions.

Bridge will automatically detect many checkout screens — click the Bridge extension icon to manually open Bridge. 

All Official Links: https://linktr.ee/bridgelabsxyz
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bridgelabsxyz
Discord: https://discord.gg/eqVvkzfvg7

Feel free to reach out via Twitter, Discord, or email at hello@bridgelabs.xyz!

Supported Cryptocurrencies: 
• Ethereum (ETH)
• Solana (SOL)
• USD Coin (USDC)
• Polygon (MATIC)
• Algorand (ALGO)

Supported Wallets:
• MetaMask
• Phantom
• Solflare
• Glow
• Pera
